name: Nightswimming
description:
It's a quiet game about driving around delivering packages during a virus outbreak. Understanding how the interface works and discovering all you can do with it is part of the game.

A game made by Ludipe with effects (3D, trail and crash) made by Mateus Sales in about 2 days for notGDCJam 2020.

Instructions.-

You play using Q, W, E, A, S, D, Z, X, C and the mouse. Escape and F can toggle fullscreen.

The game doesn't have an end. It's meant to be a relaxing experience where you listen to the radio and drive around for as long as you want to.

Misc.-

The game features an easter egg that triggers during one specific hour.
